description: Cambridge IGCSE Additional Mathematics (0606) Skill Taxonomy

skills.name: Domain and range
skills.description: Determine domain and range of functions including restrictions

skills.name: Composite functions
skills.description: Find fg(x), gf(x) and determine domain of composite

skills.name: Inverse functions
skills.description: Find f⁻¹(x) by algebraic manipulation

skills.name: Modulus functions
skills.description: Graph and solve equations involving |f(x)|

skills.name: Completing the square
skills.description: Write ax² + bx + c in form a(x + p)² + q

skills.name: Maximum and minimum values
skills.description: Find max/min of quadratic using completed square form

skills.name: Discriminant analysis
skills.description: Use b² - 4ac to determine nature of roots

skills.name: Quadratic graphs
skills.description: Sketch parabolas showing vertex and intercepts

skills.name: Quadratic inequalities
skills.description: Solve inequalities like ax² + bx + c > 0

skills.name: Graphical solution of equations
skills.description: Solve equations by finding intersections graphically

skills.name: Linear inequalities
skills.description: Solve and represent linear inequalities

skills.name: Modulus equations

skills.description: Solve inequalities involving modulus

skills.description: Rationalize 1/(a + √b) type expressions

skills.name: Factor theorem
skills.description: If f(a) = 0 then (x - a) is a factor

skills.name: Remainder theorem
skills.description: f(a) gives remainder when f(x) divided by (x - a)

skills.name: Polynomial division
skills.description: Divide polynomials to find quotient and remainder

skills.name: Solving cubic equations
skills.description: Factorize and solve cubic equations

skills.name: Linear simultaneous equations
skills.description: Solve pairs of linear equations

skills.name: Non-linear simultaneous equations

skills.name: Three linear equations

skills.description: Apply log(ab) = log a + log b and related rules

skills.description: Solve equations like sin x = k in given range

skills.description: Add/subtract vectors algebraically and geometrically

skills.name: Scalar multiplication
skills.description: Multiply vector by scalar

skills.name: Parallel vectors
skills.description: Identify parallel vectors (a = kb)

skills.name: Collinear points
skills.description: Prove points are collinear using vectors

skills.name: Differentiation of exponentials

skills.description: Differentiate ln x and ln(ax + b)

skills.name: Differentiation of trigonometric functions
skills.description: Differentiate sin x, cos x, tan x and compositions

skills.description: Differentiate composite functions

skills.name: Integration of trigonometric functions

skills.name: Integration by substitution (simple)
skills.description: Integrate using substitution for composite functions

skills.name: Definite integrals
skills.description: Evaluate ∫[a to b] f(x)dx

skills.name: Area under curve
skills.description: Calculate area between curve and x-axis

skills.name: Area between curves
skills.description: Calculate area between two curves

skills.name: Kinematics (calculus)
skills.description: Use v = ds/dt, a = dv/dt, s = ∫v dt
